title: Close a Completed Work Order
description: A work order has been fully completed and all units have passed final inspection. It needs to be closed.

tasks.description: Verify that the produced quantity matches the ordered quantity on the work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that 100 out of 100 units are marked as complete.

tasks.description: Check for any outstanding labor or material transactions that need to be recorded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that all labor and materials have been fully accounted for.

tasks.description: Change the work order status to 'Closed'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the work order, and the system calculates final costs.
